Name: Spadyssey
About the game: This game pays tribute to 2001: A Space Odyssey and is designed to provide a ' pure flyby' experience In this game, there is no magnificent world view, no wonderful game, no map, no plot, no story, no hero, no props, no skills, no maze, no decryption, even no voice - It provides the only and pure ' flyby' - which begins with flyby and ends with flyby Endless overflights of infinite space Sometimes it's like aurora Sometimes it's like a dream Sometimes it's like falling flowers dancing Sometimes it's like the waves Purple star Latosolic red flame Emerald ripples Ice blue infinite Gorgeous colorful, bizarre, dazzling ... During the game, you control the planet through the red vortex, each time through the red vortex, space speed rotation deformation, your eyes will receive unparalleled visual stimulation, this is unprecedented visual experience, is also the value of the game. During the game, it is recommended that you play your own music as the background, any music is appropriate. ( with epic, audio, rock, hip - hop, etc., can try, that will be you never get experience, refer to the game propaganda video )
Meta Title: Spadyssey: Mar 28, 2018, MOGO and Full Overview
